t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 3 days ago - Prior to the agreement, a limited selection of Nike products were available on Amazon via third-party sellers. But Nike was a "gated" brand on Amazon, meaning it was highly restricted to prevent counterfeit and low-quality items.
